AIsystem.来源: “Amazon’s Choice” Does Not Necessarily Mean A Product Is Good

Risk.来源: “Amazon’s Choice” Does Not Necessarily Mean A Product Is Good

AICapability.来源: “Amazon’s Choice” label is generated by an algorithm

Purpose.来源: Amazon uses the label to help customers quickly identify highly rated products

Stakeholder.来源: Customers who rely on the recommendation system

Consequence.来源: Customers may purchase suboptimal products based on misleading recommendations

Impact.来源: Negative shopping experiences due to poor recommendations

RiskSource.来源: The recommendation algorithm may favor certain products regardless of quality

AITechnique.来源: Amazon's recommendation system likely uses collaborative filtering techniques
